extends java.lang.Object

    Control class for session data.

      Loads updated session data back into Sessions.txt inside the txt/ directory from the public ArrayList.

      Returns the index of a particular session in the ArrayList.

      Loads session data from Sessions.txt inside the txt/ directory into the public ArrayList.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> sessionPrint(int movieID, java.lang.String sessionDate, int cineplexID)
      Prints the movies playing in a particular cineplex for a particular date as specified by the user.
